Test Name: FGA, FGB, and FGG Gene Sequencing for Congenital Fibrinogen Disorders (Next-Generation Sequencing)
Purpose: To detect pathogenic variants in the FGA, FGB, and FGG genes associated with congenital fibrinogen disorders using next-generation sequencing.
Container: EDTA blood tube or sterile container for tissue sample
Equipment: NGS instrument (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq), PCR thermocycler, DNA extraction system, library preparation kit, bioinformatics analysis software
